Item.comments: generic method called from other methods - assumes property 'item_number' exists.
Item.method_code:
Dim itemType As String = Me.GetType() Dim itemNum As String = Me.getProperty("item_number","invalid") Dim tableName As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName(itemType) & "]" Dim SQLstr As String = "SELECT TOP 1 " & tableName & ".id"
SQLstr = SQLstr & " FROM " & tableName SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".config_id IN " SQLstr = SQLstr & "(SELECT " & tableName & ".config_id FROM " & tableName SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".item_number='" & itemNum & "')" SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".generation like '%'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " AND " & tableName & ".is_released='1'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " ORDER BY " & tableName & ".generation DESC"
Dim latestGenItem As Item = Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr) If latestGenItem.isError() Then Return latestGenItem
If latestGenItem.getItemCount() = 1 Then Me.setID(latestGenItem.getProperty("id","invalid")) Me.setAction("get") Return Me.apply() Else Return Me.getInnovator().newError("No released generation of item '" & itemType & "' with item_number '" & itemNum & "' found !") End If
Return Me
Item.name: Get Latest Released Item By Num
